name: Kinect drone
tagline: Controlling the Parrot Ardrone 2.0 using Gestures
body:
![Skeletal tracking](/home/jay/Pictures/track.png)
==============
Controlling the Parrot Ardrone 2.0 with  Kinect Camera and  LeapMotion sensor.
## Simulation done on the turtlesim package


## ROS packages needed:
1. turtlesim
2. skeleton_markers
3. ardrone_autonomy
4. openni_camera
5. turtlesim
